item.title: Help on the command pickup
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

This is what my code is for ::pickup

} else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); }

It only lets player rights 3 pickup?? please help?

Read full topic
